overview: This popular British animated series created and directed by Tony Garth proves that "Little Monsters" can get into trouble almost anywhere -- even at school. After all, school is a place for learning, and they've got plenty of learning to do! These episodes find Shy Sophie trying to dodge the limelight; Dirty Dermot fighting his Aunt Clara about taking a bath; and Sickly Simon playing his favorite role: hypochondriac.
title: Little Monsters: Monsters at School
